description:
Five thousand years ago, traditional Chinese medicine shared the profound wisdom and connection between the physical body and the emotional body. If you have spleen issues, you could worry a lot. If you worry, it could affect your spleen. They are interrelated. In this course you will learn how to transform worry and blockages in the spleen.

This interactive 45-minute course is presented in six segments where you will learn sacred, simple, practical and highly-effective techniques to self heal worry. You will also receive extraordinary soul healing blessings from Dr. and Master Sha for healing worry.

This course is appropriate for anyone who suffers from occasional to frequent worry, and for anyone who wishes to prevent worry or spleen issues, and is appropriate for all age groups. Instructions are given verbally and visually to support your learning.
title: How To Self Heal Worry
